original_text: There were 32,500 men in the clans of the tribe of Ephraim. The clans of the tribes of Manasseh and Ephraim were all descendants of Joseph.
korean_text: 이는 에브라임 자손의 종족들이니 계수된 자가 삼만 이천오백 명이라 이상은 그 종족을 따른 요셉 자손이었더라

sentences.original_text: in the clans of the tribe of Ephraim
The clans of the tribes of Manasseh and Ephraim
